General.Name: Englewood Lab Inc
General.Description: Englewood Lab, Inc. engages in the research and development, manufacture, and sale of cosmetics in South Korea. It offers skincare products comprising a range of oils, creams, serums, cleansers, and masks; hybrid beauty products, including primers and foundations, BB and CC creams, concealers, blushes and illuminizers, bronzer highlighters, and lip care products; and SPF/ACNE, personal hygiene, and skin protectant over the counter products. The company was founded in 2004 and is headquartered in Totowa, New Jersey.
General.Address: 88 West Sheffield Avenue, Englewood, NJ, United States, 07631
